title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages library locations, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary() function:
code: library(libminer) lib_summary() #>                                                                        Library #> 1                                           C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2                          C:/Users/gillespiek/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.3 #> 3 C:/Users/gillespiek/AppData/Local/Temp/1/RtmpQHN768/temp_libpath2fcc70245b76 #>   n_packages #> 1         29 #> 2        252 #> 3          1
